name: OmniShoutmon
effect: Your [Shoutmon] can digivolve into this card in your hand for a memory cost of 4, ignoring this card's digivolution requirements.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has ＜Blitz＞, it gains ＜Security Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
